channel.title: Neon Killer - LilBoi [Synthwave] [Trap]
channel.description:
I have been playing a lot of Hotline Miami lately and I just love how aesthetic the game is. The Amazing soundtrack and the retro graphics are so awesome. That’s why I decided to make this retro synthwave track. I know it’s a little bit long but it’s worth it to listen. Go give it a try.
Soundcloud https://soundcloud.com/lil_poi/neon-killer ![image|690x450](upload://qVzsHTatp9gvLgfJ9bQvceDd7RP.jpeg)
